segments.text: I called the airlines to reconfirm the reservations today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't you dare tell me that ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry . I didn't reconfirm in time and they gave away half of the seats .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , they should have called you !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They said that they did . I've been so busy ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And you didn't think to leave them my cell phone ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I didn't think there would be a problem .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's the holidays ! Everybody knows how hard it is to get tickets !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry . We're still going . I got reservations for all of us on the 31st . It will be OK . Trust me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Trust you ! You can't even handle simple plane reservations !
segments.speaker: S2
